Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Fritz and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
You bet I do!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Fritz as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Man, I still can't help but feel this is all a
dream...but I know it isn't! I couldn't be happier
right now!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Heh heh. I'm so lucky to have such good friends
here to wish us well. I'll remember this day for
the rest of my life! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I've got you here by my side, and there're all
these people here wishing the both of us well...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I don't think I could ever forget a single moment
of this amazing day. I'm so stupidly happy right
now! <MYNAME>, I love you!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations to both of you. Fritz, you take
good care of <MYNAME>, now. Make her
happy!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Watching two youngsters get hitched who're
practically grandkids to me makes me glad I'm
still alive. Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Klaus and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Klaus. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Klaus as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I am so lucky to have someone as wonderful
and adorable as you for my wife.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I think having such close friends here for our
wedding helped me get through it without my
nerves tightening up.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'm so glad I was able to concentrate on the joy
of marrying you without worrying about any
jitters.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
With so many people here to celebrate our
wedding, how could I be anything other than
happy?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>And your wedding dress looks stunning on you.
I love you, <MYNAME>. I am the luckiest man in
the world to have you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
EEEE!! <RED>∀</RED> You both look so FABULOUS!
<PAGE>
Klaus, honey, when did you manage this? You
lucky guy! Aaah, I can't wait to get married
myself!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, you two! What could be more
beautiful than a glorious wedding between Klaus
and <MYNAME>, two of my dearest friends?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Raeger and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Raeger. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Raeger as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I'm kinda sad that I don't get to show off how
beautiful you look today, since this wedding is
just for us...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>But then, the thought that I get to keep this
sight all to myself has a certain thrill all its own!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I can't help but feel a little awkward, having our
close friends here to celebrate our union...but I
also can't deny it's very nice.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I couldn't be happier right now. Thank you for
giving me your hand in marriage, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Wow... It's humbling to see all these people
come here just to celebrate our wedding.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>This is the best ceremony we could've possibly
had. I'll remember it forever! <MYNAME>...I love
you. Let's build a happy life together.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, I'm so jealous of you, you lucky duck! Be
happy, both of you!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You two make a wonderful couple.
Congratulations. Raeger, you be sure to make
<MYNAME> happy, now!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Mistel and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mistel. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes. I do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Mistel as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Being able to marry you is the happiest thing
that has ever happened in my life. I'll never forget
this day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>To marry one's beloved in the presence of one's
closest friends... There could be no happier
moment for me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Wedding you, my beloved, and being celebrated
by all of these people... Nothing could make me
happier.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>In fact, I don't think I've ever felt this happy and
content in my entire life. I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You both make such a splendid couple.
Congratulations.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy to have a new, adorable little sister
in the family. Mistel, you be certain to make
<MYNAME> happy, now!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, both of you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Mistel's been looking brighter and happier than
ever since he found you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And not only did he find his match, but marry
her, too! It's almost a miracle. Both of you hold
on to each other tightly, okay?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Nadi and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nadi. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Nadi as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'll never forget this lovely day. Marrying you has
made me the happiest I've ever been.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Having all my friends make such a big fuss over
us is kind of embarrassing. But...it's a good sort
of embarrassing.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'm certain the feeling within my soul right now
is that of true happiness.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Having all these people here just to make a big
fuss over our union is kind of embarrassing.
But...it's a good sort of embarrassing.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>...And you really do look beautiful in that outfit. I
love you, <MYNAME>. Being married to you
makes me happier than I've ever imagined.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats to both of you! Nadi, I'm glad you
found somebody awesome to be with. You two
make a great couple.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Congrats, Nadi! But did you really have to get
hitched?! I thought at least YOU would always
keep me company here in the bachelor club...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of Kamil and
<CHARANAME0> shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Kamil. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Kamil as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'm still not sure this isn't all a dream. Nothing
could make me happier than being married to
you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
It is a little embarrassing to have such close
friends here celebrating with us, but I'm still glad
to have them.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'll remember today forever. I don't think I could
ever be happier than I am right now.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
It's a little embarrassing to have all these people
here just to celebrate our wedding, but I'm still
glad to have them.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><MYNAME>...Thank you for choosing to marry
me. I love you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, both of you! You'd better make
each other happy now, though.
<PAGE>
It'll be sad not having you at the inn anymore,
Kamil, but you can always come visit. Think of
us as your second family!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats! <MYNAME>, you look beautiful! ♪
And Kamil looks like a real prince, right out of a
fairy tale!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and
Elise shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Elise as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Elise. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>You and I...a private wedding ceremony...this is
like a dream to me. I'm so happy.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>What a beautiful ceremony. Cozy, too, with just
our closest friends here to celebrate. I'm so
happy right now.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
All these people are here, just to celebrate our
wedding. I couldn't be happier.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I will remember today for the rest of my life.
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. Even though you're married
now, Elise, please keep on stopping by so that I
can dress you all up again.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, both of you! Elise, I'd love it if you
could tell me all about what married life is like
sometime.♪

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and Iris
shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Iris as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Iris. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Wow, we're really here, aren't we? Nothing could
make me happier than I am today.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>What a lovely ceremony. I'm so flattered that our
friends came to celebrate us. I couldn't be
happier.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Look at all the people who came here, just to
celebrate our wedding. I couldn't be happier.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>We'll both remember today for the rest of our
lives. Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Iris. <MYNAME>. Congratulations. You both look
splendid.
<PAGE>
But <MYNAME>, I want you to promise me
something. Don't ever make my sister cry...or I'll
see to it that you regret it!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations to both of you! Iris, welcome to
the wife club! ♪
<PAGE>
If you ever have any problems with married life,
come talk to me. No, come talk to me anyway!
<PAGE>
We can gossip all day about things only us
wives can understand.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and
Lillie shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Lillie as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lillie. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Is this really happening? It still feels like a dream.
I...I'm so happy!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>It's so awesome to have our friends here
celebrating us in this amazing ceremony. I'm
really, really happy right now.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Oh my gosh, all these people are here just to
celebrate our wedding? I'm so happy!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'll never forget today. Ever. It was the best
wedding ceremony I could've asked for. I love
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! Look at you, Lillie, all grown
up... I'm so proud, I could cry!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look beautiful, Sis! I want to find my Prince
Charming too, so I can have a pretty wedding
just like this!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and
Agate shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Agate as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Agate. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes! Of course I do!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I've dreamed of marrying you for so long, and
now here we are. I'm, like, super-duper happy!
<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>It's so neat to have all our bestest friends here to
watch our wedding. I'm super-duper happy right
now!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Wow! I'm so happy that this many people came
to see our wedding! It's...beautiful!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'll never forget this day. Not ever! Thank you for
the amazing wedding ceremony, <MYNAME>. I
love you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, both of you. Agate, you look
stunning! ♪
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, take good care of her, okay? Make
her happy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The two of you make a lovely couple. I hope
you'll enjoy a long, loving life together.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and
Angela shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Angela as
your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Angela. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0> as
your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
I do.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Here we are. The wedding day. It feels like a
dream to me. I'm so...so happy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>To be married to you, with my mother and our
friends here to celebrate...it's like a dream to me.
I'm so happy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
It's wonderful to have so many people here to
celebrate our wedding. I am truly happy right
now.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I will remember today for the rest of my life.
Thank you for this beautiful ceremony.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I knew Angela would be the first one of us to get
married!
<PAGE>
She always said that wouldn't happen, but see? I
told you she would!
<PAGE>
Hee hee! You both make an amazing couple.
Congratulations!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oooh! Angela, you look really pretty!
Congratulations to both of you.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, please take good care of Angela.
Make her the happiest bride in the whole world!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for coming
today. The wedding of <CHARANAME0> and
Licorice shall now commence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>First, will the bride and the groom please step
forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>. Do you vow to take Licorice
as your one and only wife, to have and to hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Licorice. Do you vow to take <CHARANAME0>
as your one and only husband, to have and to
hold...
<PAGE>
...in sickness and in health, for richer or poorer,
forever side-by-side as you walk down the path
of life?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
Yes. I do.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I am so happy right now. I will remember today
for the rest of my life.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Though it's only a few of our closest friends, I
feel bashful having them here to watch. But I'm
still so happy.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_WEDDING>
We are blessed to have this many people want to
come and celebrate our wedding.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><MYNAME>...thank you for this beautiful
ceremony. I love you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations to both of you! You make each
other happy, now, you hear?
<PAGE>
We'll be sorry to see you leave the inn, Licorice,
but do think of us as your second family and
drop in now and again.
<PAGE>
The plants always seem to do better when you're
around...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! Licorice, you look beautiful!
<MYNAME>, you look like a real prince, too!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You may now kiss the bride.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, no! If I don't hurry up, the ceremony will
end! Waaah! Why won't you ring, you silly bell?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Dessie, calm down, calm down! Deep breaths!
Deep breaths!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MORA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Does anybody have any yummy snacks? Eating
yummy snacks can help anybody calm down!
♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>If we did that, the ceremony would end before
we're finished!
<PAGE>
<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Shh! Quiet, everyone! We mustn't make such a
big fuss!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TORCU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What on earth are all of you doing?!
<PAGE>
Dessie, I'll help you. Let's all try ringing the Bell
of Blessings one more time, together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>But...but...it doesn't want to ring! Waaaah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>AUGH!! Enough! I can't sit here and watch you
nincompoops anymore!
<PAGE>
You were the one who said you wanted to do
something to celebrate <MYNAME>'s wedding,
so no more crybaby whining!
<PAGE>
I'll help you ring it, so let's all do it together and
get it over with! C'mere!
<PAGE>
<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>O-okay...I'll try.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Come on, let's all ring the Bell of Blessings for
